name: Blockworks Daily
title: Cathie Wood Joins Das Nyc
text:
Key Insight:
Cathie Wood, a prominent investment strategist, will speak at the Digital Asset Summit (DAS) NYC 2025, highlighting her perspective on institutional capital's role in digital asset adoption and blockchain innovation.

Important Information:
- Cathie Wood, Founder and CEO of ARK Invest, is known for identifying disruptive technologies
- Recently launched two digital asset-focused funds:
  - ARK Digital Asset Innovation Fund (targeting early-stage blockchain ventures)
  - ARK Digital Asset Revolutions Fund (focusing on liquid crypto strategies)
- Will discuss key trends in blockchain and crypto markets at DAS NYC
- Emphasizes connections between emerging technologies like blockchain, AI, and energy storage
- Event details:
  - Date: March 2025
  - Location: New York City
  - Ticket prices:
    - General Admission: $1,099
    - VIP Pass: $2,399 (includes speaker dinner and exclusive access)
